script:
"""
This script displays information about redirects in the table above.

Use this script to identify potential redirects that for example leak information.
"""

if ref ==1:
	header = ["Ref.", "Host", "URL", "Status Code", "Content Length", "Response Size", "Location"]

response = message_info.getResponse()
if in_scope and response:
	response_info = helpers.analyzeResponse(response)
	status_code = response_info.getStatusCode()
	if 300 <= status_code < 400:
		content_length = get_content_length(response_info.getHeaders())
		_, location = get_header(response_info.getHeaders(), "Location")
		if content_length:
			rows.append([ref, get_hostname(url), url.getPath(), status_code, content_length, len(response), location])
name: Redirect - Template Script to Analyze Redirects
